Posts.Title: Who is starting chemo in September 2016? MFalabella smilethrupain

Posts.Content: Dec 9, 2016 03:17AM tatatootsie62 wrote: Hi MFalabella, Tatatootsie here, I read your profile and I was diagnosed out of the blue with ILC in September, have had BMX and am approaching the reconstruction phase. Both surgeons and oncologists say I'm healing and doing well. My nerves are at a total frazzle because I am not able to take anymore hormones....and I feel I am becoming homicidal !!!! Some people think it's funny, but it is horrible. They say "I know the feeling" but they really don't. I am fairly new to BC.org and have been very encouraged by a lot of the gals who have already experienced what I am about to embark. Have you visited the "Lumpectomy Lounge" ?
Posts.Title: Who is starting chemo in September 2016? MFalabella smilethrupain
